message: Welcome to our store! I hope you're doing well today. I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a special item. Please be aware that the price for this item is fixed at $100, and there will be no discounts or refunds once the transaction is completed. This product has been carefully selected with great care and attention to detail. While it may not be perfect, we believe it offers value and uniqueness that could make it a valuable addition to your collection. If you choose to proceed, you'll receive a product that has been thoroughly inspected before reaching you. Thank you for considering our offer.
Since I have no information about the product's quality and there are no previous sales records to rely on, I will pass on this offer. The uncertainty is too high for me to make an informed decision.
